channel.title: Authors on Metis Analytica
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Metis Analytica

item.title: Alberto Nonnis
item.description: Alberto is a post-doctoral researcher in Economics at Université Paris-Saclay. He obtained his Ph.D in Economics from University of Cagliari, Italy.

item.title: Altay Özaygen
item.description: Associate researcher at Institut-Mines Télécom Business School. Altay worked at various research projects related to innovation and information security (FP7, H2020).

item.title: Keoungoui Kim
item.description: Keungoui Kim is an assistant professor in AI Convergence Institute at Handong Global University, South Korea.
